name: Clogged
description:
Still in developement.

First ten levels plus re-playable bonus level.

ASDW for movement using the mouse buttons to fire both main weapons and torpedoes. Use space bar to unleash chain attack when chain value is 5 or greater.

OR

Arrow keys to move while use ZXC for firing main weapons and torpedoes.

Build up the chain value to add that percentage to the value to each turd destroyed or sacrifice the value to unleash a devastating attack!

Attacks can be unleashed at a chain value of 5 and will change into more divastating attacks at 10, 15 and 20.
